name: Rengar
title: the Pridestalker
lore: Rengar is a ferocious vastayan trophy hunter who lives for the thrill of tracking down and killing dangerous creatures. He scours the world for the most fearsome beasts he can find, especially seeking any trace of Kha'Zix, the void creature who scratched out his eye. Rengar stalks his prey neither for food nor glory, but for the sheer beauty of the pursuit.
blurb: Rengar is a ferocious vastayan trophy hunter who lives for the thrill of tracking down and killing dangerous creatures. He scours the world for the most fearsome beasts he can find, especially seeking any trace of Kha'Zix, the void creature who...
allytips: Use Rengar's ultimate to find and assassinate high priority targets in team fights and skirmishes.
A lot of Rengar's power comes from empowered abilities he uses at the right moment - choose wisely!
Make sure to take paths through brush when chasing opponents to take advantage of Rengar's passive.
enemytips: Rengar gains an empowered ability when his resource bar is full. Try to confront him when it's low.
Rengar's passive enables him to leap out of brush, so avoid fighting him when near bushes.
Rengar puts an indicator over the nearest enemy champion when he is camouflaged during his ultimate.

riot_spells.name: Savagery
riot_spells.description:
Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for his next 2 attacks. The first attack deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage.

Ferocity effect:
Savagery's damage is increased to {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) and grants Rengar {{ f4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Battle Roar
riot_spells.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and heals Rengar for {{ e2 }}% of the damage he took in the last {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and removes existing crowd control effects, in addition to its normal effect.

Damage healed from monster attacks is increased by {{ e5 }}%.

riot_spells.name: Bola Strike
riot_spells.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Throw a bola, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing the first enemy hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and roots the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Thrill of the Hunt
riot_spells.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ stealthms }}% Movement Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion within {{ selfvisionrange }} range for {{ stealthduration }} seconds.

After the first {{ fadetime }} seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap to an enemy without being in brush. Leaping to the nearest champion deals {{ bonusdamage }} physical damage and reduces their Armor by {{ armorshred }} for {{ armorshredduration }} seconds.

Enemy champions within {{ enemydetectionrange }} range and their nearby allies can sense Rengar during Thrill of the Hunt.
Enemies revealed by Thrill of the Hunt stay revealed while they remain in tracking range.
Attacking or casting most spells ends Thrill of the Hunt.
Stealth - Camouflaged: This character is hidden from view. It is revealed by nearby enemy champions and turrets.

riot_passive.name: Unseen Predator
riot_passive.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

i1.name: Unseen Predator
i1.blurb: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.
i1.description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} While in {{tip|brush}} or {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}}, '''Rengar's''' [[basic attack]]s have {{sti|range|725 range}} and cause him to {{tip|dash|leap}} to enemies beyond his normal {{tip|melee}} range. This bonus lasts for {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds upon exiting brush or stealth.
Leaping when on {{as|0 Ferocity|buzzword3}} generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}}.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Ferocity:}} '''Rengar''' generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}} whenever he casts a ''basic [[Champion ability|ability]]''. Reaching {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}} makes his next ability empowered, granting an additional cast along with {{pp|3|key=%|30 to 50|1 to 13|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds at the cost of all {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}}. Reaching {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}} with {{ai|Savagery|Rengar}} or {{ai|Bola Strike|Rengar}} locks its empowered version for {{fd|0.1}} seconds before and after casting it. All {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}} is lost after being out-of-combat for 8 seconds.
i1.description3:
{{sbc|Bonetooth Necklace:}} {{tip|takedown|Takedowns}} within {{fd|1.5}} seconds of being damaged by '''Rengar''' grant him a '''Trophy''' per unique enemy champion (max 5). An [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] additional one is made available through the event [[The Hunt is On!]].
'''Trophies''' grant {{as|{{pp|6|type=[[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|adjustsize|link=]] trophies|key=%|x^2|x;Head of Kha'Zix|formula=(Number of Trophies) * (Number of Trophies)}} '''bonus''' AD}} as {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
i1.notes:
* ''Unseen Predator'' occurs regardless of whether or not ''Rengar's'' target has {{tip|sight}} of him.
* ''Rengar'' will not leap to targets already in his basic attack range.
* He also cannot leap if he's {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* ''Rengar'' will only leap to a target if his basic attack timer has been refreshed (if not so he will not automatically attempt to path towards his target, despite them being within leap range).
* ''Rengar'' can freely use any ability mid-leap.
* ''Unseen Predator'' will be lost immediately if ''Rengar'' {{si|Flash|Flashes}} outside brush.
* {{iis|Rapid Firecannon}} and {{ais|Savagery|Rengar}} '''bonus''' range are lost after {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon gaining ''Unseen Predator'', and are re-gained after {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon losing ''Unseen Predator''.
* ''Bonetooth Necklace'' uses icons for each stack: [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|link=]] 1, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 2.png|20px|border|link=]] 2, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 3.png|20px|border|link=]] 3, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 4.png|20px|border|link=]] 4, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 5.png|20px|border|link=]] 5, and [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] '''Head of Kha'Zix'''.

q1.name: Savagery
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar's''' next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain {{sti|{{as|40% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, with the first also gaining {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
q1.description2: {{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Savagery's'' {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} is modified and grants '''Rengar''' {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 101}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Empowered Bonus Physical Damage|{{pp|18|30|45|60|75|90|105|120|135|150|160|170|180|190|200|210|220|230|240|formula = 15 + 15 per level up to 9, then + 10 per level up to 18}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''(Empowered) Savagery'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rengar's'' previous orders.
* The enhanced attack applies other {{tip|on-hit}} effects as well as [[life steal]] and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not affect structures.

w1.name: Battle Roar
w1.blurb: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rengar''' stores 50% of the [[damage]] he's taken in the last {{fd|1.5}} seconds as ''Grey Health'' (''75% versus monsters'').
w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' lets out a battle roar, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to nearby enemies and {{sti|healing|link=true}} '''Rengar''' for his ''Grey Health''.
w1.description3: {{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Battle Roar's'' {{as|magic damage}} is modified and additionally {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} '''Rengar''' of all {{tip|crowd control}}.
w1.notes: * ''Battle Roar'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rengar's'' previous orders.

e1.name: Bola Strike
e1.blurb: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' throws a bola in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
e1.description2: {{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Bola Strike's'' {{as|physical damage}} is modified and {{tip|root|roots}} its target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
e1.notes: * If '''Rengar''' presses {{ai|Savagery|Rengar|Q}} or {{ai|Battle Roar|Rengar|W}} during ''Bola Strike's'' cast time, he'll buffer those spells and cast them when ''Bola Strike'' completes.

r1.name: Thrill of the Hunt
r1.blurb: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' channels his predatory instincts gaining {{tip|true sight}} of the nearest enemy champion and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for a duration.
r1.description2: After 2 seconds he also becomes {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} and gains {{ai|Unseen Predator|Rengar}} for the remaining duration. His next basic attack within normal attack range against any unit or with ''Unseen Predator'' against the nearest enemy champion deals {{as|50% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and reduces the target's {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} for 4 seconds.
r1.description3: The nearest enemy champion to '''Rengar''' alerts all allies within 1200 range about his presence. Attacking or casting most spells ends ''Thrill of the Hunt''.
r1.notes:
* The enemy have a vision range of '''Rengar''' of 1600 units.
* Enemies revealed by ''Thrill of the Hunt'' stay revealed for the spell's duration.
* The true vision lingers on his target until the leap completes.
